name: Pot Pourri Vase
maker: Model designed by Jean-Claude Duplessis the Elder, Painted by Jean-Louis Morin, After engraved designs by François Boucher, et al
description: Pot Pourri Vase; Model designed by Jean-Claude Duplessis the Elder (French, about 1695 - 1774), Painted by Jean-Louis Morin (French, 1732 - 1787), After engraved designs by François Boucher (French, 1703 - 1770), et al; Vincennes, France; 1755; Soft paste porcelain with bleu lapis ground color, carmine red painted decoration, gilding; 25.4 × 15.2 cm (10 × 6 in.); 84.DE.3.2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Pot Pourri Vase
medium: Soft paste porcelain with bleu lapis ground color, carmine red painted decoration, gilding
